feed.title: MARINKA ZITNIK
feed.subtitle: Machine Learning for Medicine and Science

entry.title: Graph Networks in Computational Biology
entry.content: We are excited to share slides from our recent lecture on Graph Neural Networks in Computational Biology, which we gave at Stanford ML for Graphs course.
entry.summary: We are excited to share slides from our recent lecture on Graph Neural Networks in Computational Biology, which we gave at Stanford ML for Graphs course.

entry.title: Fair and Stable Graph Representation Learning

link.title: Fair and Stable Graph Representation Learning

entry.content: We are thrilled to share the latest preprint on fair and stable graph representation learning.
entry.summary: We are thrilled to share the latest preprint on fair and stable graph representation learning.

entry.title: New Preprint on Therapeutics Data Commons

link.title: New Preprint on Therapeutics Data Commons

entry.content: We are excited to share the preprint on Therapeutics Data Commons: Machine Learning Datasets and Tasks for Therapeutics. TDC is available at http://tdcommons.ai.
entry.summary: We are excited to share the preprint on Therapeutics Data Commons: Machine Learning Datasets and Tasks for Therapeutics. TDC is available at http://tdcommons.ai.

entry.title: An Algorithmic Approach to Patient Safety

link.title: An Algorithmic Approach to Patient Safety

entry.content: The new algorithmic approach investigates population-scale patient safety data and reveals inequalities in adverse events before and during COVID-19 pandemic.
entry.summary: The new algorithmic approach investigates population-scale patient safety data and reveals inequalities in adverse events before and during COVID-19 pandemic.

entry.title: Workshop on AI in Health at the Web Conference

link.title: Workshop on AI in Health at the Web Conference

entry.content: We are excited to co-organize Workshop on AI in Health: Transferring and Integrating Knowledge for Better Health at the Web (WWW) conference. The call for papers is open! We also announce the AI in Health Data Challenge.
entry.summary: We are excited to co-organize Workshop on AI in Health: Transferring and Integrating Knowledge for Better Health at the Web (WWW) conference. The call for papers is open! We also announce the AI in Health Data Challenge.

entry.title: Tutorial on ML for Drug Development

link.title: Tutorial on ML for Drug Development

entry.content: We will present a tutorial on ML/AI for drug discovery and development at IJCAI conference. See the tutorial website.
entry.summary: We will present a tutorial on ML/AI for drug discovery and development at IJCAI conference. See the tutorial website.

entry.title: Two New Papers Published
entry.content: We are excited to see published our paper on DeepPurpose, a deep learning library for drug-target interaction prediction, and our paper on skipGNN, a graph neural network for predicting molecular interactions.
entry.summary: We are excited to see published our paper on DeepPurpose, a deep learning library for drug-target interaction prediction, and our paper on skipGNN, a graph neural network for predicting molecular interactions.

entry.title: Bayer Early Excellence in Science Award

link.title: Bayer Early Excellence in Science Award

entry.content: Our research won the Bayer Early Excellence in Science Award. We are honored to have received this recognition!
entry.summary: Our research won the Bayer Early Excellence in Science Award. We are honored to have received this recognition!

entry.title: Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC)
entry.content: We are thrilled to announce Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC)! We invite you to join TDC. TDC is an open-source and community-driven effort.
entry.summary: We are thrilled to announce Therapeutics Data Commons (TDC)! We invite you to join TDC. TDC is an open-source and community-driven effort.

entry.title: National Symposium on the Future of Drugs

link.title: National Symposium on the Future of Drugs

entry.content: On behalf of the NSF, we are organizing the National Symposium on Drug Repurposing for Future Pandemics. We have a stellar lineup of invited speakers! Register at www.drugsymposium.org.
entry.summary: On behalf of the NSF, we are organizing the National Symposium on Drug Repurposing for Future Pandemics. We have a stellar lineup of invited speakers! Register at www.drugsymposium.org.
